meanings.sent1: The old library still has a noncomputerized card catalog.
meanings.sent2: The traditional board game is noncomputerized and relies on dice and cards.
meanings.sent3: It's refreshing to see a noncomputerized approach to problem-solving in this digital age.
meanings.sent4: Her noncomputerized artwork stands out in a world dominated by digital designs.
meanings.sent5: The cozy cafe has a noncomputerized ambiance that attracts customers seeking a break from screens.
